subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine.com: Heaven for gearheads
body:
This Week on CBS SportsLine - a weekly programming guide





 






 



May 21-27, 2007






 
 
 
 







 



This programming guide is updated throughout the week. Click here to see the latest version






 


 


 



Heaven for gearheads
Heaven for gearheads Pole-sitter Helio Castroneves has his eyes on a third Indy title. (AP)


    

      Fans can debate individual events, but there's no single day in auto 
      racing as big as Sunday. It starts with the Indy 500 at noon ET, then 
      moves on to Charlotte, N.C., for the 600-mile Nextel Cup race at 5:30. • Indy: 
       Lineup 
      | Winners 
      | Records 
      | Charlotte: Lowe's 
      | Points 
      |  

 






 

 





 This week: NBA's final four eye the Finals


    

      
      San Antonio and Utah are 
      under way in the West, and Cleveland, with LeBron James 
      (pictured), open up at Detroit. Tony Mejia (West) and Gregg 
      Doyel (East, starting Game 3) write from the sites.
    

  
• Schedule | Spurs | Jazz | Cavaliers | Pistons  

 




U P C O M I N G  V I D E O



Daily

 
NHL highlights
Playoff highlights, every day ... just look for "CBS SportsLine highlights."
Sports Update
What's happening in sports? Jason Horowitz and Amber Wilson have the lowdown on the showdowns.







Tuesday5/22

 
Fantasy Football
Dave Richard and Jamey Eisenberg break down second-year QBs.







ThursdayMay 24

 
Fantasy Baseball
Amber Wilson and David Gonos help you plan your lineup for the upcoming week.
Auto Racing
Pete Pistone gives you the set-up for Sunday night's 600-mile race in Charlotte.







FridayMay 25

 
Fantasy Football Show
Keep up with your fellow owners in the offseason with Dave Richard and Jamey Eisenberg, every week. 
College Basketball Series
Gary Parrish looks ahead to 2012 and names his No. 2 program of the next five years, which is ...







Complete video schedule for the week 





 


 





U P C O M I N G  S C H E D U L E



MondayMay 21

 
Mike Freeman's Turn
Jason Giambi should have the respect of every player, manager, executive and fan in baseball.







TuesdayMay 22

 
Power Rankings
Eric Mack stacks up MLB for Week 8 and adds in Fantasy Power Players.
NFL
Clark Judge features the ongoing saga of Kansas City QB Trent Green.
Stanley Cup playoffs
The Ducks can close out Detroit in Game 6 of the Western Conference Finals.







WednesdayMay 23

 
Baseball
The Red Sox-Yanks finish up Game 3 of their series in the Bronx -- Schilling vs. Pettitte. 









ThursdayMay 24

 
Gregg Doyel
His My Turn column -- and your chance to fire back in Hate Mail.
Fantasy Baseball
Michael Hurcomb answers your questions in Dear Mr. Fantasy.







FridayMay 25

 
College Basketball
Gary Parrish reveals his No. 2 among the elite programs.








SaturdayMay 26

 
Fantasy Baseball
David Gonos' Hitting Planner for Week 8.








SundayMay 27

 
Fantasy Baseball
Get your lineup set early -- don't miss Eric Mack's Pitching Planner.







Next Week

 
Tennis
The season's second Grand Slam event, the French Open, begins at Roland Garros in Paris.






 




K E Y   D A T E S



June 14

 
Golf
The U.S. Open begins at Oakmont Country Club in Pennsylvania.







June 15

 
College Baseball
The CWS kicks off in Omaha.







Aug. 5

 
NFL
Pro Football Hall of Fame Game, New Orleans vs. Pittsburgh.
